text: (gentle music)

- [Narrator] As you improve
your workplace with RPA bots,

you need an easy, agile,
and comprehensive solution
to manage your environment, track metrics,
and control your bots and users.
Welcome to the IBM Robotic
Process Automation control center,

where you can manage
the available resources
and share your scripts with other users.
You can schedule bots
or configure them for manual launching.
When workloads get overwhelming,

you can distribute tasks
across multiple bots
by automating processes
with multiple steps across computers.

It's intelligent workload
management that saves you time.

The RPA control center
helps you stay on top
of project progress and meet SLAs,

everything you need to boost
your business performance.
It's time to help your teams take control.
Build and manage bots,

display metrics with
interactive dashboards,

create robust workload plans,
and much more with IBM RPA.
